thread.title: Cloudy weather with overcast skies to continue in UAE
thread.title_full: Cloudy weather with overcast skies to continue in UAE

title: Cloudy weather with overcast skies to continue in UAE
text:
Cloudy weather with overcast skies to continue in UAE Filed on February 28, 2017 | Last updated on February 28, 2017 at 08.31 am Share 
(Khaleej Times) The day is expected to be pleasant today. The day started on a pleasant note for early morning joggers with chill in the air. The National Center of Meteorology & Seismology posted that the day would be partly cloudy with light to moderate winds. There is a chance for mist formation and rise in relative humidity over the night and early morning. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 28, 2017 This morning saw mist over parts of Al Minhad, Ras Al Khaimah, Swiehan, Al Bateen Airport and Liwa. Mist over Al Minhad - Ras Al Khaimah -Swiehan- Al Bateen Airport and Liwa - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 28, 2017 The day is expected to be pleasant with the current temperature at 19 degree Celsius to rise till 21 degrees maximum. Share
